title.rendered: Simple tips to win a $100 Visa e-gift card at OctFest

content.rendered:

OctFest #okcbeerfest Contest</h4>

Formal Rules

Just entries submitted and gotten throughout the marketing Period will undoubtedly be accepted. Sponsor is the formal timekeeper with this promotion.

3. Eligibility. 4. Simple tips to Enter. There is certainly one strategy of entry. Entries maybe maybe russian brides sites not legitimately submitted according to these rules that are official void.
